body.p: I received the Blessed Sacrament at S. Edward's Altar.
In the course of the morning, I, passing thro' the Abbey, fell in with two mariners, & acted as their guide.
I called on Fedarb & had some speech with him.
I attended Evensong, & listened to rather a dull sermon from Rashdall.
Beeching & I walked the length of the Embankment, & returned.

p.hi: I wrote a letter to the Times, entitled, "Disestablishment & Religious Education".
